title: Game freezes As soon as start up after new patch
body: Hey guys anyone else having issues after new patch this Client freezes, is there any fixes or suggestions on how to fix? it freezes the whole computer to the point where i have to restart it, mouse icon freezes cant type or anything !

replies.body:
I have the same issue, whole computer freezes the first time I logged in. Tried again and it didn't freeze but the Client home page was glitched. Today same thing, go to login and computer froze but the home page looked back to normal. I have not tried to login again yet as I don't want to risk another freeze.
[Update]
Tried to login in again but instead of restarting once the freeze happens I waited it out and after around 5 mins the freeze fixes its self. Still unsure what the cause is.
do u have a pc or mac?
